meta.description: Optimize the allocation of land for growing different fruits to maximize profit.

sets.name: FRUITS
sets.description: Types of fruits that can be grown on the farm.

params.name: profit
params.description: Profit per acre for each type of fruit.

vars.name: land
vars.description: Acres of land allocated to each type of fruit.

vars.name: grow
vars.description: Binary variable indicating whether a fruit is grown or not.

objective.name: max_total_profit
objective.description: Maximize the total profit from growing fruits.

constraints.name: total_land_constraint
constraints.description: Total land used must not exceed available land.

constraints.name: apples_pears_constraint
constraints.description: Land for apples should be at least twice the land for pears.

constraints.name: apples_lemons_constraint
constraints.description: Land for apples should be at least three times the land for lemons.

constraints.name: oranges_lemons_constraint
constraints.description: Land for oranges must be twice the land for lemons.

constraints.name: max_two_fruits_constraint
constraints.description: No more than two types of fruit can be grown.

constraints.name: apples_grow_constraint
constraints.description: Land for apples is zero if not grown.

constraints.name: pears_grow_constraint
constraints.description: Land for pears is zero if not grown.

constraints.name: oranges_grow_constraint
constraints.description: Land for oranges is zero if not grown.

constraints.name: lemons_grow_constraint
constraints.description: Land for lemons is zero if not grown.
